comments.author: Lawton Campbell.8517
comments.body: It’s not currently possible, but it’s a feature that’s being looked into. Here’s the tracking issue on Github, which has some more discussion.

comments.author: Infuxion.3876
comments.body:
Hello!
I have a website (www.gw2clanes.com) in which the clans are recorded and put their data.
I was thinking that would be good to know the last connection of the members of the guild to make a statistical active clans.

It’s possible?

Regards

PD: sorry my english
